The Axel Clan

After a great trip to Dallas earlier this year where I grilled my dad on our family tree, I signed up at Tribal Pages today to get started tracking down my ancestors. So far so good.




axel.tribalpages.com




some links:




http://wc.rootsweb.ancestry.com/




http://www.familysearch.org/eng/default.asp




http://pilot.familysearch.org/recordsearch/start.html
